attributes.action: Give stay to asylum seekers who have been here more than 5 years
attributes.additional_details: How do they expect ppl to pay when they are not allowed to work,Don't get benefits or support for that matter!Set them free ,instead of keeping their life's in limbo!They have built new lifes here family/friends,Surley it's only fair ,
attributes.background: People who have asylum here and lived here for nearly 15 yrs applied to for right to stay turned down more than once with no reason apart from every time they apply they have to pay! which makes money for the home office!set them free give them stay and build a better life for themselfs get jobs
